profile.roll:
Full-Stack Web Developer with more than 10 years of experience specialized in creating innovative digital solutions.

As a freelancer I have developed websites, web applications and business systems for various clients, with a high margin of satisfaction. Specialist in Artificial Intelligence Tools, Digital Marketing and process automation.

I have experience with modern technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, React, NodeJS, Express, Python, PHP, MySQL, MongoDB, Wordpress, Woocommerce, TailwindCSS and AI tools for development.

about.leftP:
I am a Full-Stack Web Developer with more than 10 years of experience, specialized in the creation of digital platforms, web and mobile applications, e-commerce, LMS and custom solutions. My technical training in Software Development (UNAB & SENA), along with diplomas in Python, Java, Spring Boot and React, has allowed me to develop a comprehensive and professional approach.
As an independent freelancer, I have created a wide variety of websites, web applications and business systems for companies and individuals with a high margin of satisfaction from my clients. I have knowledge in technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Sass, TailwindCSS, JavaScript ES6+, React, NodeJS, Express, Python, Django, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot, PHP, MySQL, MongoDB, Wordpress, Woocommerce, Automation and AI Agents.
My passion for innovation, web development and automation and AI tools, combined with knowledge in Digital Marketing and SEO, allows me to create scalable and results-oriented solutions that generate real value for my clients.
about.tl-p1: I have worked on various projects, from websites to web applications for companies and individuals with a High margin of satisfaction from my clients.
about.tl-p2:

Autonomous University of Bucaramanga & ICT Ministry - Colombia.

about.tl-p7: Development of software and digital certification systems. Implementation of web platforms for certification management and digital validation processes.
about.tl-p8: Development and maintenance of delivery platform. Technologies: React, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, process automation and system optimization.
about.tl-h59: Technologist in Software Analysis and Development - SENA
about.tl-p9: Professional training in software development, systems analysis, databases, object-oriented programming and agile methodologies.

about.tl-p10: Intensive training in web technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, modern frameworks and complete web application development.
about.tl-p11: Over 1,200 hours of full-stack web development training, including certifications in Responsive Web Design, JavaScript Algorithms, Front End Development Libraries, Data Visualization, APIs and Microservices, Information Security and Quality Assurance.
about.tl-h512: Digital Marketing and Online Advertising - Google Activate + IAB Spain
about.tl-p12: Certifications in digital marketing, online advertising, Google Ads, analytics, SEO/SEM and digital marketing strategies.
